languages.text: "Сдайте оружие и ждите своей участи. Трибунал проведем после того, как я здесь закончу".
"Lay down your weapons and await your judgement. We will hold the tribunal once I am done here."
languages.original_text: "Сдайте оружие и ждите своей участи. Трибунал проведем после того, как я здесь закончу".

traits.locale_text: "Lay down your weapons and await your judgement. We will hold the tribunal once I am done here."
"Lay down your weapons and await your judgement. We will hold the tribunal once I am done here."
"Lay down your weapons and await your judgement. We will hold the tribunal once I am done here."
"Lay down your weapons and await your judgement. We will hold the tribunal once I am done here."
"Lay down your weapons and await your judgement. We will hold the tribunal once I am done here."
"Lay down your weapons and await your judgement. We will hold the tribunal once I am done here."

languages.text: “放下武器，等待审判。等我这边的事情办完之后，审判就正式开始。”
languages.original_text: "Lay down your weapons and await your judgement. We will hold the tribunal once I am done here."

traits.locale_text: “放下武器，等待审判。等我这边的事情办完之后，审判就正式开始。”

languages.text: "Legt Eure Waffen nieder und erwartet Euer Urteil. Wir halten das Tribunal ab, sobald ich hier fertig bin."
languages.original_text: "Lay down your weapons and await your judgement. We will hold the tribunal once I am done here."

traits.locale_text: "Legt Eure Waffen nieder und erwartet Euer Urteil. Wir halten das Tribunal ab, sobald ich hier fertig bin."

languages.text: «Deponed las armas y seréis juzgados. Compareceréis ante un tribunal cuando yo haya terminado aquí».
languages.original_text: "Lay down your weapons and await your judgement. We will hold the tribunal once I am done here."

traits.locale_text: «Deponed las armas y seréis juzgados. Compareceréis ante un tribunal cuando yo haya terminado aquí».

languages.text: « Déposez vos armes et attendez votre sentence. Le procès aura lieu lorsque j'en aurai terminé ici. »
languages.original_text: "Lay down your weapons and await your judgement. We will hold the tribunal once I am done here."

traits.locale_text: « Déposez vos armes et attendez votre sentence. Le procès aura lieu lorsque j'en aurai terminé ici. »

languages.text: 「武器を置いて判決を待て。ここが終わったら、裁判を行う」
languages.original_text: "Lay down your weapons and await your judgement. We will hold the tribunal once I am done here."

traits.locale_text: 「武器を置いて判決を待て。ここが終わったら、裁判を行う」

languages.text: "Silahlarınızı bırakıp yargılanmayı bekleyin. Buradaki işim bittiğinde yargılanacaksınız."
languages.original_text: "Lay down your weapons and await your judgement. We will hold the tribunal once I am done here."
